availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William B. Newton (: Franklin County farm laborer and private)

body.p: Franklin County farm laborer and private. Franklin County native. Son of Benjamin S. Newton. Private in Company C, 9th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment from 1862 to 1863.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, District 1, p. 8. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, Frankfort, Peaks Mill District, p. 42. Eleventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1890), Veterans Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, Peaks Mill, p. 2. Kentucky Vital Statistics Original Death Certificates (1911-1955), 1930, Scott County, file no. 32077.
